title: Man Who Laundered Billions in Bitcoins Says Bitcoin Fog Was a Help: Bloomberg
description: Ilya Lichtenstein, one of the crypto industry's most high-stakes criminals, is now helping federal prosecutors in their case against Bitcoin Fog, one of the mixing services he said he'd used to conceal assets.

title: Bitcoin’s surge to $57K did not result in liquidation storm, defying expected trend
description:
Bitcoin crossed the $57,000 mark on Feb. 27, reaching its highest level since November 2022. This surge, driving the price from $54,000 to $57,300 within 24 hours, led many to see it as the beginning of a bull rally, especially significant in a Bitcoin halving year. Despite the blistering gains, the expected wave of liquidations […]

The post Bitcoin’s surge to $57K did not result in liquidation storm, defying expected trend appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: White House Highlights Bitcoin Mining’s Strain on Power Grid
description: White House has sounded the alarm about the rising strain Bitcoin mining puts on the national power grid, citing environmental worries amid the cryptocurrency’s surging demand. As more people mine Bitcoin to increase its value, the significant energy consumption required for the process has drawn intense scrutiny.  This concern stems from the environmental impact of […]

title: IMF identifies digital currencies as key to financial inclusion in Pacific Island countries
description: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has recently shed light on digital currencies’ potential benefits and risks in Pacific Island countries (PICs). These nations face unique monetary challenges due to geographical isolation, small and diverse markets, and specific economic vulnerabilities. In a comprehensive paper, the IMF revealed how, with careful design, digital currencies could meet these […]
